#-----Solution-----

def main():
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    b = list(map(int, input().split()))
    c = []
    for i in range(n):
        c.append(a[i]+b[i])

    c.sort()
    l = []
    for i in range(n):
        l.append(c[i]%n)

    print(*l)

main()

n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))
b = list(map(int, input().split()))

c = []
for i in range(n):
    c.append((a[i] + b[i]) % n)

c2 = sorted(c)

for i in range(n):
    b[c.index(c2[i])] = i

print(" ".join(map(str, b)))

n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))
b = list(map(int, input().split()))

c = []
for i in range(n):
    c.append((a[i]+b[i])%n)

c2 = sorted(c)

for i in range(n):
    b[c.index(c2[i])] = i

print(" ".join(map(str, b)))


def main():
    n = int(input())
    a = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    b = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    c = [((x + y) % n) for (x, y) in zip(a, b)]
    c.sort()
    print(' '.join([str(x) for x in c]))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

    c = [(x + y) % n for x, y in zip(a, b)]

# -----Solution-----

def main():
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    b = list(map(int, input().split()))
    c = []
    for i in range(n):
        c.append(a[i]+b[i])

    c.sort()
    l = []
    for i in range(n):
        l.append(c[i]%n)


    print(*l)

main()


def main():
    n = int(input())
    a = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    b = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    c = [(a[x] + b[y]) % n for (x, y) in zip(a, b)]
    c.sort()
    print(' '.join([str(x) for x in c]))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
